DOC.brief_summary: Background : Rotator cuff tendinopathy ( RCTe ) frequent cause shoulder pain , result considerable loss society public coffer . Muscle imbalance inadequate sensorimotor control deficit often associate RCTe . Kinesiotaping ( KT ) widely use rehabilitation RCTe . While previous study examine effect KT shoulder injury short-term isolated method treatment , publish study address mid- long-term effect combine rehabilitation program ( RP ) patient RCTe ( use clinic ) . The main objective study ass effectiveness therapeutic KT application add RP reduce pain disability patient RCTe . Secondary objective cover underlying factor related shoulder control , muscular activity , acromiohumeral distance ( AHD ) , range motion ( ROM ) . Methods/Study design : A single-blind , randomize control trial conduct . Fifty-two patient , randomly allocate one two group ( KT no-KT ) , receive 10 physiotherapy session six week . The KT-group receive therapeutic KT add RP , whereas no-KT group receive RP . Primary outcomes symptoms functional limitation assess Disabilities Arm , Shoulder , Hand ( DASH ) questionnaire . Measurements take baseline , week-3 , week-6 , week-12 6-month . Secondary outcome include shoulder active ROM , AHD rest 60ยบ abduction , shoulder muscle activation arm elevation . The added effect KT assess 2-way ANOVA repeat measure . Discussion : Investigations high level evidence need determine scientific evidence-based concern efficacy KT rehabilitation individual RCTe . This RCT first assess effectiveness KT add conventional RP patient RCTe , address underlying factor could explain possible benefit method , mid- long-term . Results may contribute build solid evidence addition KT physiotherapy intervention population .

DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria . To eligible , participant present one positive find follow category : Painful arc movement flexion abduction ; Neer ( sensitivity 0.78 , specificity 0.58 ) KennedyHawkins impingement sign ( sensitivity 0.74 , specificity 0.57 ) ; Pain resist external rotation , abduction empty test ( sensitivity 0.69 , specificity 0.62 ) . Exclusion Criteria . Patients exclude : open wound compromise KT application ; previous shoulder surgery ; allergy intolerance KT ; adhesive capsulitis , define loss passive shoulder ROM great 50 % ; history glenohumeral luxation fracture shoulder girdle ; shoulder pain reproduce cervical movement ; clinical sign fullthickness RC tear identify lag sign test ( drop , internal , external rotation sign ) .
